summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's PowerBright Overnight Cream takes advantage of skin's overnight repair process by fading dark spots while you sleep.
details: DetailsBenefitsNourishing nighttime creamRestores skin's luminosityOptimizes skin moisture recoveryHelps provides antioxidant protectionFades the appearance of dark spotsSmooths and evens skin textureBest suitable for those experiencing hyperpigmented skin and uneven skin toneFor best results, use PowerBright Dark Spot Serum each morningKey IngredientsNiacinamide and Hexylresorcinol: work synergistically to help fade the appearance of dark spotsVitamin C: delivers antioxidant benefits and brightening propertiesPumpkin Enzymes: smooths and evens skin textureCranberry and Raspberry Seed Oils: help protect against the damaging effects of free radicals from pollution, and moisturize to help reduce the appearance of fine linesLicorice Extract: helps soothe the skinFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceItem 2281036How To UseSmooth over face and neck as the last step of your nighttime regimen. For best results, use PowerBright Dark Spot Serum each morning.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Methylheptyl Isostearate, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetyl Alcohol, Isohexadecane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Hexylresorcinol, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Hydrogenated Phosphatidylcholine, Phytosterols, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polysilicone-11, Tocopherol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Zinc Glycinate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Isostearic Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Decyl Glucoside, Benzyl Salicylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Glycolate, Sodium Formate, Dimethiconol, Limonene, Farnesol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth over face and neck as the last step of your nighttime regimen. For best results, use PowerBright Dark Spot Serum each morning.

reviews.headline: Amazing for dark spots and sun spots!
reviews.comments: I bdgan using this product about a year ago on a pesky, large sunspot on my cheek and various dark marks left after pimples. This stiff is AMAZING. It is expensive, and requires consistency (nightly application) and a few bottles, but it definiely does work. I continue to use it on spots as they appear or after a pimple and my face looks far better than before! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Not Moisturizing
reviews.comments: Left skin dry and flacky

reviews.headline: Long time user
reviews.comments: I would absolutely recommend this to anyone who struggles with age spots and scarring. It's hydrating, doesn't feel heavy and absorbs quickly. You have to use the whole system, but my skin has never been healthier. The biggest con with Dermalogica is the cost. I pull apart the bottle and use every last drop.

reviews.headline: It is working on my sun spots!
reviews.comments:
I have a large sun spot on my cheek and a few other smaller ones around my face. I have tried so many products over the past several years, including a very expensive one from the dermatologist, and nothing helped. The only thing that helps a bit is to get BBL treatments, but that's painful and inconvenient and still doesn't make the spots go away for good.

I'm just finishing up my first bottle of this and I have noticed a significant lightening of all my sun spots including the big one. It isn't gone by any means, but this is the first time I've noticed any difference, so i had to write a review. I feel like my skin just looks better in general. I am going to purchase another bottle now so I don't run out!

reviews.headline: Non incentivized endorsement
reviews.comments: I bought this with my hard earned cash and IT WORKS. I dont know if I am fooling myself but I've seen results immediately. I have freckles and sun spots and putting on this cream every night has lightened them. I have never seen so much progress from a brightening product and I have a lot (Caudalie Vinoperfect, Skinceuticals Discoloration defense and Vitamin C, Skin Medica, Clarins Double Serum, Sente, you name it). This product is superior to them all AND its moisturizing. Thank you Dermalogica.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing
reviews.comments: I have tried tons of night creams and this is top notch! Glides on smoothly! Soin feels soft and moistured in the morning! Definitely recommend this for your skincare routine!!

reviews.headline: Love this.
reviews.comments: I purchaed the 30day kit to try the products in this line, and have suprising come to love this profuct the most. I can't tell if this product is fading my dark spots, but I know that I each night I perfer this moisturizer over others because I love the way my skin feels the next day. As much as I didn't want to like this product, I will be purchasing this after I finish my current product that I am currently trying.

reviews.headline: Makes my skin so red and itchy!
reviews.comments: I do have somewhat sensitive skin but this product exacerbates/amplifies any issues I have beyond what is normal.  I get pretty severe itching and  redness when I use this product AND my eyes also hurt and get itchy m.  To boot, the product has done NOTHING for my dark spots.  So basically I have been beating through the torture of red, itchy skin for nothing.  If you have anything close to "sensitive skin," stay far, far away from this product.  I am so mad I shelled out over $80 for this!  I also used to love Dermalogica products but I am so turned off to them now.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Have used for 30 days and I have seen a difference on my age spots fading. It goes on smooth and melts in your face. Not harsh on your face. Will definitely be buying again.

reviews.headline: Has a nice subtle scent
reviews.comments: I really like Dermaogica products and this overnight cream is not an exception. The scent is a little bit like coconut but not a fake potent coconut scent I actually enjoyed the subtle smell and I have seen my skin tone more even. I haven't seen a major improvement on my dark spots yet and I am combining it with their powerbright serum too for AM. *Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Great for Older Skin
reviews.comments: Use over night as directed after cleaning my face with dermoligica cleaning gel and facial brush

reviews.headline: I would but this product again.  It really does work
reviews.comments: I use it at night.  It takes very little and you can spread it easily over your entire face.  I have seen results and have had comments from my family and friends.

reviews.headline: Great product will buy again
reviews.comments: I love the way it makes my skin feel. It is not greasy. Smells good and moisturizes well!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This is by far the best night cream I have ever used.l It's super light and I already see a brighter complexion.

reviews.headline: love, use it every night.
reviews.comments: love it, use it every night.

reviews.headline: I'd buy it agian!
reviews.comments: Love it! Its my nighttime go too after a bath. My skin looks and feels great in the morning. Not greasy at all.

reviews.headline: !!! Its awesome!!!
reviews.comments:
Oh my gosh!! it really works even on old hyperpigmentation  .Before buying this I was skeptical especially because of the cost but now I can safely say that it works. I have tried even laser & peels and my pigmentation always came back.  
This is the very first Dermalogica product I ever used and I m so happy and impressed that i have bought several products from the brand in last 1.5 years . 
it's a treatment serum intended to be used at night time only ,mainly for pigmentation, brightness & spots which it does but u should and have to use an appropriate moisturiser of ur choice with it or whatever night cream you use..

reviews.headline: Pure Night was not rich enough for this mature skin!
reviews.comments: This is probably better product for a younger persons skin, I'm in my 60's. It's dry where I live, and it's winter dry as well.

reviews.headline: I really LOVE DERMALOGICA
reviews.comments: Really terrific stuff!! Won't be using anything else, that's for sure.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love it

display_values: Use before bed, last step in cleaning routine

properties.name: Pros

values.label: The Glow I Get From This

display_values: The Glow I Get From This

faceoff_positive.comments: I was so lucky to get a sample of this with my last order and was very pleased with it! I was worried that it might break out my skin (I'm prone to break outs), but it did not. The combination of this with the C-12 serum really made my skin feel great! I think my brown spots may be slightly less noticeable with my short use...I think if I could afford the full size of this (and the serum) and use it for longer that the results would be more noticeable.
faceoff_positive.headline: Very nice!

faceoff_negative.comments: I loved the Pure Night ChromaWhite-- used it every night and it really helped lighten my acne scars. This new formula contains cyclopentasiloxane, which seems to be in everything now (it's so hard to find moisturizers without it-- I live in fear of Active Moist being reformulated). Unfortunately, anything with that stuff in it gives me horrible cystic acne. Wish you would bring back the old formula.
faceoff_negative.headline: New formula
